name: Five Dynasties Chai Kiln Blue-Glazed Openwork Dragon Boat Fortune Child Pillow
description: Five Dynasties Kiln Blue-Glazed Openwork Dragon Boat Fortune Child Pillow. This Later Zhou Official Kiln masterpiece, dated 13×17cm, is a world-shocking rarity that set a kiln auction record at 410 million HKD in the 2025 Hong Kong Autumn Auction. It is hailed as definitive proof of the 'Porcelain Emperor' kiln, renowned for its crystal-clear blue glaze, exquisite openwork carving of dragon boat and fortune child motifs, and the rare 'Great Zhou' base mark, symbolizing its exclusive royal provenance and pinnacle craftsmanship of the era.
